easy fix for anyone who knows it.

For PacketType 16

Also known as case 16:
in the client.java file

there is this line

			int item_id = inStream.readSignedWordA();

But there is no slot information, does any one know where the slot is or what it is for slot? Thanks for the help.

			int itemSlot = ???;

inStream.readSignedWord();

inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
